ddmsQuickOrder.descriptionText: Here you can quick order product individually or as a list, CSV list or Excel table
ddmsQuickOrder.tab1CardTitle: Add products with CSV or Excel file
ddmsQuickOrder.tab1CardDescription: You can download demo file from here
ddmsQuickOrder.tab2CardTitle: Add several items to your basket at one go via this table
ddmsQuickOrder.tab2CardDescription: Enter the quantity and item number (ours, yours or an item number from another supplier) in the corresponding field
ddmsQuickOrder.tabinfo1li1: Mark and copy several rows from a table and paste them into this field
ddmsQuickOrder.tabinfo1li2: The online shop puts all the items in this table into your shopping cart

message.indexNotFound: Column name does not exist in table
message.articleNumberNotFound: This article number was not found
message.itemNotFound: Item not found or item number not unique
message.successMessage: Items successfully added to your basket
